venue.name: Ron Paul Literature Distribution at Anti-war Rally

item.description:
Bring family, friends, and neighbors to meet fellow Republicans at

Alpine Grove, 19 South Depot Road, Hollis, NH 03049

Sunday August 19 from 12:00-4:00 PM.

Hotdogs, hamburgers and all the fixings, and salad and unlimited soda will be provided.

Price is $18/person.
Make checks payable to HCRC and mail to:
Mrs. Gerry Porter, PO Box 542
Amherst, NH 03031-0542

Note: The campaign has purchased a display table and Ron Paul will be with us for this event!
Please buy your tickets in advance.

Group travel to Hollis from Boston is being organized. Departure will be at 10:30 a.m. from 1500 Dorchester Avenue (in front of Kit Clark Senior Services) in Dorchester (adjacent to Fields Corner MBTA station). The group will leave Hollis at 4:00 p.m. and arrive back in Boston at approximately 5:30 p.m.

All inclusive tickets (transportation and BBQ fee) will be $25.00 and must be purchased by August 15.

Contact Joe at 617 436-0320.
item.name: Hillsborough County Republican Committee BBQ with Ron Paul
